motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • Approval of February 13, 2023, City Council Meeting Minutes • Civility Resolution • Funding Authorization for 4987 Heatherdale Lane Storm Repairs • Surplus Obsolete Technology Equipment • Additional Funding Authorization for 2389 Welton Place Storm Repairs

motions.title: Intergovernmental Agreement with DeKalb County for DeKalb Veteran's Memorial Renovation
motions.description: Approval of Intergovernmental Agreement with DeKalb County Board of Commissioners for funding renovation of DeKalb Veteran's Memorial with Commissioner Patrick offering $100,000 toward renovation project.

motions.title: Settlement Agreement with Alan Miller, M.D. - 4553 N. Shallowford Rd Tenancy
motions.description: Approval of settlement agreement and release with Alan Miller, M.D. to resolve tenancy issue at 4553 N. Shallowford Road with Dr. Miller agreeing to vacate by March 7.

motions.title: Settlement Agreement with Jada Ruffin-Moore, M.D. - 4553 N. Shallowford Rd Tenancy
motions.description: Approval of settlement agreement and release with Jada Ruffin-Moore, M.D. to resolve tenancy issue at 4553 N. Shallowford Road with Dr. Moore agreeing to vacate by March 4.

motions.title: Purchase and Sale Agreement Authorization with SHG DUNWOODY, LLC
motions.description: Authorization to close Purchase and Sale Agreement with SHG DUNWOODY, LLC as referenced in 4th Amendment dated August 12, 2022, with closing scheduled for March 8.

motions.title: Right of Way Deed for 4555 North Shallowford Road
motions.description: Approval of right of way deed for 4555 North Shallowford Road to preserve section of right-of-way and convert to public right-of-way.

motions.title: Local Matching Funds for Ashford Dunwoody Interchange Design
motions.description: Authorization to provide local matching funds for Ashford Dunwoody interchange design with GDOT providing $1M toward study and city/PCID each contributing $100,000 as local match.

motions.title: Resolution Establishing Moratorium on Drug Rehabilitation Centers
motions.description: Approval of resolution establishing 180-day moratorium on drug rehabilitation centers and other facilities for treatment of drug dependency.

specialEvents.title: Introduction of Jonathan DiGioia as Safe Streets Program Manager
specialEvents.description: Richard McLeod introduced new Safe Streets employee Jonathan DiGioia, PE, who will work with city on part-time basis as employee of Aacom.

discussionItems.title: Resolution for Budget Amendment for Fiscal Year 2022
discussionItems.description: Presentation of resolution for budget amendment for Fiscal Year 2022 showing city has 7.5-month fund balance. 2023 revenue adjustments to be presented at future meeting.

discussionItems.title: Approval of Recycling Event RFPs
discussionItems.description: Presentation of recycling event RFPs to demonstrate to DeKalb County that Dunwoody conducts own recycling events. Staff recommends Clean Earth as winning bidder.

notes: Officer Jonah Amos oath postponed to next meeting due to unavailability
Council Member Heneghan absent from meeting
Multiple property sale-related items addressing tenancy issues at 4553 N. Shallowford Road
